overview: Irit Bardugo's only son has reached bar mitzvah age, and she's planning a synagogue celebration the likes of which the neighborhood has never seen. Even when everything goes wrong, Irit is not going to give in without a fight.
tagline: Irit Bardugo is determined that her son's bar mitzvah will be the event of the year, no matter what.
title: IRIT BARDUGO'S BAR MITZVAH
